word.item: At sunrise, I and my cousin with two donkeys went to the forest for firewood.
The weather was good and clear, but wind was blowing from the upper end a little bit.
We arrived at the forest and tied our donkeys.
We hadn't yet made one bundle of firewood when the donkey's bellowing and roaring started.
Now, we ran (and saw that) wolves had surrounded the donkeys.
We, too, shouted, and with stones and sticks, with our axes, we chased the wolves away.
We chopped the firewood without difficulties and returned home.
